hooks.command: say 'Claude code is done, please check.'

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); user=$(whoami); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); git_info=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null | sed 's/^/ (/; s/$/)/' || echo ''); printf "\033[2m%s@%s:%s%s | %s | %s\033[0m" "$user" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$git_info" "$model" "$style"
